abstract: mitie group pt lowered to gbx 205 at peel hunt .
article: mitie group had its target price reduced by peel hunt from gbx 253 to gbx 205 in a research note issued to investors on tuesday . peel hunt currently has a hold rating on the stock . other research analysts have also issued reports about the company . liberum capital reissued a buy rating and issued a gbx 270 price objective on shares of mitie group in a research report on tuesday , december 5th . jefferies group reissued a buy rating and issued a gbx 290 price objective on shares of mitie group in a research report on tuesday , november 21st .

canaccord genuity reissued a buy rating and issued a gbx 300 price objective on shares of mitie group in a research report on monday , november 20th . finally , numis securities reissued a reduce rating and issued a gbx 175 price objective on shares of mitie group in a research report on friday , december 15th . two equities research analysts have rated the stock with a sell rating , two have issued a hold rating and three have given a buy rating to the stock . the stock has an average rating of hold and an average price target of gbx 232 .

mitie group opened at gbx 190.70 on tuesday . mitie group has a fifty-two week low of gbx 170 and a fifty-two week high of gbx 313.50 . the firm has a market capitalization of $ 691.60 and a price-to-earnings ratio of -1,121.76 . mitie group last issued its earnings results on monday , november 20th . the company reported gbx 5.20 earnings per share for the quarter , missing the zacks ' consensus estimate of gbx 7 by gbx -lrb- -rrb- . mitie group had a net margin of 0.53 % and a return on equity of 9.08 % .

the firm had revenue of £ 959.70 million during the quarter . the firm also recently announced a dividend , which will be paid on wednesday , february 7th . stockholders of record on thursday , december 21st will be given a dividend of gbx 1.33 per share . this represents a dividend yield of 0.66 % . the ex-dividend date of this dividend is thursday , december 21st . in other mitie group news , insider derek mapp bought 40,000 shares of the company 's stock in a transaction dated wednesday , november 29th . the shares were acquired at an average cost of gbx 204 per share , with a total value of £ 81,600 .

the company 's soft fm segment includes cleaning and environmental services , security , catering and front of house services .
